Room.Name: The Grand Gate of Thalos
Room.Description: You stand in the archway of a gigantic stone archway. The two steel gates have been forced open and have rusted in place. A hollow gust of wind blows by you into the deserted, and seemingly destroyed, city.

Exit.Description: You see a trail out of this blasted place.
You see devastation everywhere. Houses lie in ruin and skeletons litter the streets. You see strange beasts stalking the shadows.

Room.Name: Main Street
Room.Description: This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin. The streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending. A dark alley leads north and south. Howls and screams echo through the deserted city.

Exit.Description: It's a dark alley.
The entrance to the city lies this way.
It's a dark alley.
Main Street lies this way.

Room.Name: Main Street
Room.Description: This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin. The streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending. On one side is a collapsed house while on the other is the entrance to a large ruined mansion. Eerie sounds echo within the mansion. Near the center of town you see a large domed building, relatively intact.

Exit.Description: The remnants of a store lie this way.
It looks like what used to be the main building in the city.
A withered garden path lies this way.

Room.Name: A Garden Path
Room.Description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet. A sudden volley of howls pierces the air.

Exit.Description: The garden path continues around the building.
This is the main street leading to the city's entrance
The garden path continues around the building.
Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

Room.Name: A Garden Path
Room.Description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet. A sudden volley of howls pierces the air.

Exit.Description: A side street leads off to the northern half of the city.
The garden path continues around the building.
The garden path continues around the building.

Room.Name: A Garden Path
Room.Description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet. A sudden volley of howls pierces the air.

Exit.Description: The garden path continues around the building.
Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

Room.Name: A Garden Path
Room.Description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city. Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet. A sudden volley of howls pierces the air.

Exit.Description: The garden path continues around the building.
A small side street leads to the southern half of the city.

Room.Name: The market place
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a large square lined on each side with baskets, carts, and stands of all shapes and sizes. Abandoned, these little shops still contain some of their goods once sold to a demanding public.

Exit.Description: A small table has been toppled over, spilling fine jewelery and gems onto the ground.
Rotted remains of fruits and vegetables lie strewn about.
The market place continues.

Room.Name: The market place
Room.Description: You stand at the end of the market square. Stands and carts line each side, filled with remnants of fine foods and exquisite goods.

Exit.Description: Tattered carpets and ruined bales of silk sit idly by a run down stand.
The center of the market lies this way.
From the massive stench, this must have been a meat and poultry stand. It lies totally bare.

Room.Name: A Side Street
Room.Description: This small side street leads east and west into back alleys while to the south you see the temple. The incessant howling tears at your mind.

Room.Name: A Side Street
Room.Description: You are in the common section of the city. Ruined buildings made of clay and stone is all the view has to offer. Most of these homes are nothing but piles of rubble, but some look almost safe enough to venture into. The street continues north and south and buildings line the street.

Exit.Description: A small doorway leads into a partially collapsed house.
A small clay dwelling sits here.

Room.Name: A Side Street
Room.Description: This small side street leads away from the garden path to the south. Around you stand large piles or rubble where the houses of commoners used to be. A lone howl makes you worry greatly about your safety here.

Exit.Description: An unusually tall dwelling stands looming over you.
A garden path circles around the temple.
Here lies a small stone house with a thatched roof.

Room.Name: A side street
Room.Description: This small side street leads south away from the temple into the business section of town. The destruction that leveled this city was not biased; these important looking buildings have been almost totally destroyed. There is a hole in the wall of a very large structure to the east.

Exit.Description: A small garden path encircles the temple.
This possibly could be the city hall.
Inside the building you see long pieces of metal, an oven, and some anvils.

Room.Name: A side street
Room.Description: This small side street is lined with the remains of once great buildings. To the north is a dark, foreboding structure while to the east lies the entrance to a small tavern. The street continues north and south.

Exit.Description: From the looks of it, this was once a two story abode. The entire second floor has collapsed leaving a very little part of the bar still free from debris.
This seems to be the only guild house in the entire city. Its dark nature makes you wonder about its origins.

Room.Name: A side street
Room.Description: You are at the end of a long street leading to the center of the city. A long dark alley runs east and west.

Room.Name: Under a ruined watchtower
Room.Description: You stand at the base of a tall watchtower built to protect the city from invaders. From the looks of things, it did not do a good job.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: This alley leads to the rear of what used to be a meat stand. You wince at the stench. South is one of the city watchtowers.

Exit.Description: You see the back-side of the market place meat stand.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

Room.Name: The meat stand
Room.Description: A large stand has been set up here with metal hooks and wooden racks in the background. Hanging on the hooks are very small scraps of meat and other game. This stand is relatively empty, and a sudden burst of howling and screaming makes you realize why this is so.

Exit.Description: The market place lies this way.
This is a cart full of rotted vegetables and fruits.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of the city watchtowers.

Exit.Description: A small side street greets you.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

Room.Name: The guild house
Room.Description: You are standing in what once was this city's ONLY guild house. Tables and chairs have been smashed and broken weapons lie strewn about the floor as if some massive battle had taken place here. Draped along the back wall is a tattered, jet-black banner with the symbol of the Darkside set upon it.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the building.

Room.Name: The produce stand
Room.Description: A large cart sits here carrying rotted fruit and vegetables. Flys swarm all about what seems to be the last remaining bits of food left in the city.

Exit.Description: The market place is deserted.
A strong stench emanates from the meat stand next to you.

Room.Name: The smithy
Room.Description: In here you find tools and anvils used to make various weapons and items. The walls have been stripped clean and only a few incomplete pieces of armor and weaponry are left.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the building.

Room.Name: The tapestry stand
Room.Description: Tattered and torn tapestries and rugs lie heaped in piles. Fancy robes and various articles of clothing are now just rags. You stare at the strange piles for a long time until a piercing howl makes you think these might be beds.

Exit.Description: A fine jewelry stand lies in ruin next to you.
The market place is deserted.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers while to the south there lies a market stand full of torn clothes and rugs.

Exit.Description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

Room.Name: Under the watchtower
Room.Description: You stand under one of the city watchtowers built to protect the city from invaders. Obviously, it failed.

Exit.Description: Above you looms a tall watchtower.

Room.Name: The jewelery stand
Room.Description: A table has been tipped over, spilling fine jewelery and gems across the market place. Most of these trinkets are battered and tarnished and few would have any value anymore.

Exit.Description: The market place is deserted.
Next to you is a stand full of ruined clothes and rugs.

Room.Name: A ruined clay dwelling
Room.Description: This was once a very plain house with nothing more than a few chairs and a bed. A cold fireplace suggests that the city has been abandoned for quite a while. Almost nothing remains of this humble abode.

Exit.Description: Outside is a small side street.

Room.Name: A collapsed stone dwelling
Room.Description: This small house has completely collapsed upon itself leaving piles of debris here and there. A few rafters still stand with thatched straw hanging down and a hot wind gusts through the hollow dwelling.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the house.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads east to one of the city watchtowers and west to a small side street.

Room.Name: An abandoned shop
Room.Description: From the outside this place looks like an ordinary pile of rubble, but inside these cramped quarters you discover what used to be a shop filled with armor, weapons, and various other goods. A small sign flutters in the wind.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the shop.

Room.Name: The Tavern of the Sun
Room.Description: A glorious place in it's prime, this tavern now lies in ruin; tables and chairs are broken scattered, bottles and glasses shattered, and a small performance stage crushed. Musical instruments and personal belongings lie under the rubble, but the people they once belonged to are not with them. Looking up you see that the entire second floor and roof has fallen in, leaving a gaping hole above.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the tavern.

Room.Name: South wing of the city hall
Room.Description: You stand in a large room attached to this end of the hallway which leads back north to the reception area. Pedestals and columns have fallen and most of the valuable items have been taken, leaving worthless debris. A few chairs have survived, as well as a large curved desk. To the east is a vine-covered archway leading out into a private courtyard.

Exit.Description: The long hallway leads back to the main reception area of the city hall.

Room.Name: The city hall
Room.Description: This is the main reception area of Thalos' city hall. The walls have been charred and scored massively and debris is spread from wall to wall. A large gaping hole in the west wall allows you to see out to one of the city's side streets. Obviously no one will be seeing you through today. Hallways lead south and east.

Exit.Description: Main street runs past the city hall.
A hallway leads to the east wing of the city hall.
A hallway leads to the south wing of the city hall.

Room.Name: East wing of the city hall
Room.Description: Here lies the remnants of a fancy office, possibly the mayor's. A few withered plants and broken pieces of furniture make this place anything but fancy, though. The only thing remaining intact here is a large glass cabinet. A long hallway leads west back to the reception area and an ivy-covered archway leads south into a private courtyard.

Room.Name: The private gardens and courtyard of Thalos
Room.Description: What a shame that this mass destruction also touched this once beautiful place. The temple's garden path has nothing on this garden. Flowers and trees have been smashed into the ground and lawn benches thrown through walls. A large marble fountain in the center of the courtyard still stands, though, defying any attempts to destroy its beauty. Above stands the remnants of one of the watchtowers. Archways north and west lead back into the city hall.

Room.Name: A small guard house
Room.Description: This was once the barracks for Thalos' cityguards. Now just an empty shell, this small shack still stands guarding the entrance both to the city and to the city hall.

Exit.Description: The alley runs by this building.

Room.Name: A collapsed home
Room.Description: All that's left of this house is a few scattered piles of rubble and a very large blast crater. Obviously someone or something important was once housed here. A shrieking howl chills your blood.

Exit.Description: Main street runs past this ruined home.

Room.Name: A tall dwelling
Room.Description: This seems to be the tallest structure remaining in the city. At one time this could have been an inn of some sort, but now it's just a mess. The back wall as been completely knocked down revealing an entrance into another building through yet another collapsed wall. Between the two buildings are a few blast craters and boulders. An old set of wooden steps leads up to a creaking second floor.

Exit.Description: A small side street winds past the dwelling.
The stairs and even the entire second floor itself looks very unsafe for travel. Gusts of wind make them creak and shudder.

Room.Name: A small shack
Room.Description: This cramped dwelling could not have housed more than one person. Now with the back wall missing, it could hold many more. Looking around you find broken shelves and workbenches with various vials and pouches spilling contents all across the floor. This was possibly the magic shop of the city. The doorway to the east is blocked, making the only exit back west.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow back alley goes south to main street and north towards a watchtower. A mass of howls catches you off guard.

Exit.Description: Main street runs past here.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow back alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers and south towards main street. To the west is a doorway to a small house blocked by debris.

Exit.Description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

Room.Name: Under a watchtower
Room.Description: You stand under a tall watchtower. Narrow back alleys lead west and south and a very weak looking ladder leads up into the tower.

Exit.Description: Winds howl high above your head in the tower above.

Room.Name: A bath house
Room.Description: This was once the bath house for the commoners of the city. Hot steamy water still wells up from a hole in the floor. Obviously there is a hot spring located under the city (making the decision to put a city here seem much more reasonable). Closer inspection of the water yields a dead body floating around in it, skin melted away from months of floating in there. The west wall has collapsed revealing another collapsed house.

Exit.Description: The wall has collapsed on the adjoining house, creating a new opening in it.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow back alley leads west to a small side street and east to one of the city watchtowers. Great amounts of steam issue forth from the building to the south.

Exit.Description: A watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
A side street runs by here.

Room.Name: An upright house
Room.Description: This home is practically the only one around that is still standing. Except for the massive hole in the east wall, everything else looks intact, including the windows. Great amounts of steam issue forth from the hole in the east wall.

Exit.Description: A small side street runs past the house.

Room.Name: On the second floor
Room.Description: The minute you step off onto this floor you realize it was a mistake. The old rotted floorboards suddenly give way and you fall down, impaling yourself on jagged boards below. You've fallen, and you can't get up! ! !

Room.Name: The north-west watchtower
Room.Description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. No wonder this place stood for so long.

Exit.Description: The city lies below.

Room.Name: The south-west watchtower
Room.Description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the south the desert stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood for so long.

Exit.Description: The city lies below.

Room.Name: The north-east watchtower
Room.Description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent from here and you can see a great floating pyramid to the north-east. Desert sand stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood for so long.

Exit.Description: The city lies below.

Room.Name: The Temple of Thalos
Room.Description: You stand within one of the most holy places in the realm. This stunning domed temple once housed the city's worshipers en masse. Unfortunately, it succumbed to the destruction brought on this city. Long benches lie toppled and the altar desecrated. Large chunks of stone have fallen from the walls and roof, sending sunlight streaming in on you. A few books lie about, conveying to you a holy message in a strange tongue. Wind gusts through the four archways and howls and screams can be heard from all parts of the city.

Exit.Description: A side street leads to the northern half of the city.
Main street leads out to the main gate of the city.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of the city watchtowers.

Exit.Description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
A small side street greets you.

Room.Name: Under a ruined watchtower
Room.Description: You stand at the base of a tall watchtower built to protect the city from invaders. From the looks of things, it did not do a good job.

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads south to one of the city watchtowers.

Exit.Description: The alley continues to the north.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

Room.Name: The south-east watchtower
Room.Description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the south the desert stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood for so long. There is a small plaque on the stones.

Exit.Description: The city lies below.

ExtraDescription.Description: This extension to Thalos, along with the dwarf forest, is made by Hatchet for any Merc Mud. Copyright 1992

Room.Name: A back alley
Room.Description: A narrow alley leads north to the main street, and south toward a tall watchtower. A ruined building is to the west.

Exit.Description: You see main street.
It looks in bad shape inside, but structurally intact.

Room.Name: The Trail to Thalos
Room.Description: The trail splits off from the dwarf forest, heading west toward the town of Thalos. To the east, you see a T-intersection. Both sides of the trail are lined by stunted trees and dry brush.

Exit.Description: You see Thalos!

Room.Name: The Trail to Thalos
Room.Description: The trail splits off from the dwarf forest, heading west toward the town of Thalos. To the east, you see a T-intersection. Both sides of the trail are lined by stunted trees and dry brush.

Exit.Description: You see the intersection.

Room.Name: The Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see more stunted trees here. A side trail leads west from here. To the east, you THINK you see a trail, but you can never be sure.

Exit.Description: You see the trail lead back north.
You can't see into the gloom of this forest.
You see the trail branch off.

Room.Name: The Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see more stunted trees here. It looks almost as if this place was cursed by a god to be short and dry. The trail leads north and south.

Exit.Description: You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

Room.Name: The Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see more stunted trees here. It looks almost as if this place was cursed by a god to be short and dry. The trail leads north and south.

Exit.Description: You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

Room.Name: The Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see many stunted trees here. You don't see any leaves on these barren trees. No grass grows on the ground.

Exit.Description: You see the trail continue south.

Room.Name: The Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see more stunted trees here. It looks almost as if this place was cursed by a god to be short and dry. The trail leads east and west. It looks dark toward the east.

Exit.Description: You see a darker part of the forest.
You see the lighter forest and the T-intersection west.

Room.Name: The Darker Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees. The gloom caused by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around. The trail turns south from the west.

Exit.Description: You see nothing in the gloom south of you.
You see the dwarf forest.

Room.Name: The Darker Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees. The gloom caused by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around. The trail turns east from the north.

Exit.Description: You see nothing in the gloom north of you.
You see nothing in the gloom east of you.

Room.Name: The Darker Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees. The gloom caused by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around. The trail leads east and west, and to the south you can make out some withered trees.

Exit.Description: You see nothing in the gloom east of you.
You see nothing in the gloom west of you.

Room.Name: The Darker Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees. The gloom caused by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around. The trail leads down into a valley and west.

Exit.Description: You see nothing in the gloom west of you.
You see the trail lead down into gloom.

Room.Name: A valley in the dark dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a valley in the dark dwarf forest. Short black grass grows around you. Trails lead in all directions.

Room.Name: A small ugly cave
Room.Description: You see a small cave. Skeletons of many types of creatures litter the area. Obviously, no fox lives here! The oppression makes you want to leave and vomit.

Exit.Description: You see more of the cave.

ExtraDescription.Description: Something is strange about these skeletons. Upon further investigation, these skeletons appear illusionary.

Room.Name: A small ugly cave
Room.Description: You are in a small ugly cave. More skeletons lie around. It is obvious that the owner doesn't want you here. The exit north is still visible. Some writings are on this wall.

Exit.Description: You see more of the cave.
You see a path leading down into the dark gloom.

ExtraDescription.Description: Something is strange about these skeletons. Upon further investigation, these skeletons appear illusionary.
This cave along with the valley and dwarf forest is made by Hatchet for any Merc Mud. Copyright 1992

Room.Name: Down the path into a dead end
Room.Description: You are down the path. There is no obvious exit in this place, exit the one back up north. All around you, you see skeletons.

Exit.Description: You see your only way back up.

ExtraDescription.Description: Something is strange about these skeletons. Upon further investigation, these skeletons appear illusionary. In fact, through the skeletons, you see a secret door! !

Room.Name: The Valley in the dark dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a valley in the forest. To the north is a trail out of this dark valley. South is more of this valley.

Exit.Description: You see a trail away from this gloomy valley.
You see more of this gloomy valley.

Room.Name: A dim trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest. Not much light passes through here. To the south is a gloomy valley, while to the north the light grows brighter.

Exit.Description: You can actually see the trail north of you!
You can barely see the gloomy valley south of you.

Room.Name: A dim trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest. Not much light passes through here. The trail runs north and south, and the light seems to come from the north. To the east, you see a small path into darkness.

Exit.Description: You see the dim trail lead north.
You see the small path.
You see the dim trail lead south.

Room.Name: A dim trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest. Not much light passes through here. The trail runs north and south, and the light seems to come from the north.

Exit.Description: You see the dim trail lead north.
You see the dim trail lead south.

Room.Name: A bend in the dim trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest. Not much light passes through here. The trail runs south and west. The trail west looks much friendlier than the one leading south.

Exit.Description: You see the dim trail lead south.
You see the trail lead west.

Room.Name: A trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest. The trees are stunted and it looks dry around here. The trail leads east and west. It looks dimmer to the east.

Exit.Description: The trail continues east to the dimmer parts of the forest.
The trail continues west.

Room.Name: A trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest. The trees are stunted and it looks dry around here. The trail leads east and west.

Exit.Description: The trail continues east.
The trail continues west.

Room.Name: A trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest. The trees are stunted and it looks dry around here. The trail leads east and west.

Exit.Description: The trail continues east.
The trail continues west.

Room.Name: The bend in the trail in the dwarf forest
Room.Description: You are in a bend in the trail in the forest. The trees are stunted, but not so dry around here. The trail leads east, and to the south, you see a waterfall.

Exit.Description: The trail continues east.
You see a beautiful waterfall.

Room.Name: A dark bend in the forest
Room.Description: You are in a dark bend in the forest. To the west, you see the trail leading back to the dwarven forest, and to the south, you see a dark and dismal path.

Exit.Description: You see the trail back to the Dwarven Forest.

Room.Name: By the beautiful waterfall
Room.Description: You see a VERY beautiful waterfall here. It looks almost as if diamonds are falling down the mountain. (You reach out and grab and no, it IS only water. ) It looks so nice here, you feel like taking a nap. The trail leads north and south.

Exit.Description: You see the trail leading north.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: A Valley in the Dwarf Forest
Room.Description: The light begins to dim as the thick canopy of trees overhead blocks out the sun. The air becomes cool and damp, and the scent of earth and damp moss fills your nostrils. You hear the sounds of creaking trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional crack of a branch underfoot. The ground beneath your feet is covered in short, black grass that seems to absorb the little light that filters through the trees. The valley walls rise steeply on either side, their rocky faces covered in gnarled roots and thick vines. The forest seems alive with movement, yet you see no signs of any creatures lurking in the shadows.

Room.Name: The Trail to Thalos
Room.Description: The trail splits off from the dwarf forest, heading west toward the town of Thalos. To the east, you see a T-intersection. Both sides of the trail are lined by stunted trees and dry brush.

Room.Name: The Trail to Thalos
Room.Description: The trail splits off from the dwarf forest, heading west toward the town of Thalos. To the east, you see a T-intersection. Both sides of the trail are lined by stunted trees and dry brush.

NPC.name: oldstyle beholder
NPC.description: It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you to disintegrate you. Beholders are not known for their personality.
NPC.longDescription: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle lamia beast
NPC.description: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.
NPC.longDescription: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic chest
NPC.description: A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy pad-lock on the front.
NPC.longDescription: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic boulder
NPC.longDescription: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic floor
NPC.longDescription: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic pottery
NPC.longDescription: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic planks
NPC.longDescription: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle lizard horned
NPC.description: A cute little lizard, that is, if you like reptiles!
NPC.longDescription: A small horned lizard flicks his tongue and slithers away.

NPC.name: oldstyle golem stone
NPC.description: It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.
NPC.longDescription: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.

Item.Name: mithril vest
Item.LongDescription: A vest made of mithril plates lies heaped on the floor.

Item.Name: helm mithril
Item.LongDescription: Here lies a large mithril helm.

Item.Name: gauntlets mithril
Item.LongDescription: A pair of mithril gauntlets rests on the ground.

Item.Name: sleeves mithril
Item.LongDescription: A set of mithril sleeves lies on the ground.

Item.Name: boots mithril
Item.LongDescription: A pair of mithril boots stands has been left here.

Item.Name: leggings mithril
Item.LongDescription: A set of mithril leggings lie here unattended.

Item.Name: girth mithril
Item.LongDescription: A large iron girth lies at your feet.

Item.Name: breast plate iron
Item.LongDescription: A battered iron breast plate lies here.

Item.Name: shield iron
Item.LongDescription: A small, but sturdy, iron shield has been left here.

Item.Name: potion black
Item.LongDescription: A jet black potion sits upright waiting to be taken.

Item.Name: potion orange
Item.LongDescription: A small orange potion lies here.

Item.Name: ball quartz
Item.LongDescription: A smooth quartz ball lies here gleaming.

Item.Name: scroll tattered
Item.LongDescription: A worn and tattered scroll has been left here.

Item.Name: scroll bound
Item.LongDescription: A bound scroll of detection lies at your feet.

Item.Name: flute silver
Item.LongDescription: A brilliant silver flute glimmers from beneath a rock.

Item.Name: talisman demon
Item.LongDescription: A demon-faced talisman glares at you angrily.

Item.Name: venison chunk
Item.LongDescription: A large chunk of venison sits here ready to be eaten.

Item.Name: fountain water
Item.LongDescription: Some stagnant water lies in the bottom of the fountain.

Item.Name: two-handed two sword
Item.LongDescription: A nice two-handed sword hangs on a hook in the wall.

Item.Name: robe black silk
Item.LongDescription: A black silk robe lies heaped in one corner.

Item.Name: cloak green
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful dark green cloak has been dropped by someone.

Item.Name: seal ebony
Item.LongDescription: A small, engraved ebony seal is here.

Item.Name: desk curved
Item.LongDescription: A dirty, crumbling curved desk is here.

Item.Name: seal ivory
Item.LongDescription: A small, engraved ivory seal lies here.

Item.Name: cabinet glass
Item.LongDescription: A broken glass cabinet is here.

Item.Name: arm rotted
Item.LongDescription: A rotted arm floats lazily by your feet.

Item.Name: stone pale blue
Item.LongDescription: A pale blue stone sits here.

Item.Name: stone scarlet blue
Item.LongDescription: A pretty scarlet and blue stone has been dropped here.

Item.Name: stone blue incandescent
Item.LongDescription: A small incandescent blue stone lies here.

Item.Name: stone red deep
Item.LongDescription: Someone has left a deep red stone here.

Item.Name: stone pink
Item.LongDescription: A tiny pink stone lies at your feet.

Item.Name: stone pearly white
Item.LongDescription: This pearly white stone would probably sell for a good price.

Item.Name: stone lavender green
Item.LongDescription: A stunning lavender and green stone rests on the ground.

Item.Name: stone grey dull
Item.LongDescription: You can barely make out a dull grey stone on the ground.

Item.Name: stone pink green
Item.LongDescription: A bright pink and green stone has been left here.

Item.Name: stone clear
Item.LongDescription: A odd clear stone lies at your feet.

Item.Name: mandolin
Item.LongDescription: A mandolin lies against the wall.

Item.Name: harp golden
Item.LongDescription: A battered golden harp has been tipped over.

Item.Name: long dagger slim
Item.LongDescription: A long slim dagger has been left here.
